programme.title: Loaded Dogs And Classic Cocktails in San Diego
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to San Diego to sample a modern spin on classic deli fare, heavily loaded low-riding hot dogs, frosty And fruity Taiwanese snow ice, and fancy French cocktails from a rotating carousel bar.

programme.title: Tacos, Brats, And Biscuits in Austin
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes down south to try Austin’s best bets - breakfast tacos are on the itinerary, as well as a bangin’ beer garden And sausage house, loaded biscuits, and dessert pancakes to boot! Austin may be weird but the food is fabulous.

programme.title: Smash Burgers And A Slice in Los Angeles
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to all the buzzworthy spots in LA - cooking up calamari steak at a classic Mexican joint, tasting taro root donuts with fun flavors, grabbing a guanciale slice, and hopping on the line to make cheesy scrumptious smash burgers.

programme.title: Pierogies, Bagels, and Ramen in NYC
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza takes a LOT of bites out of the big apple as he samples warm pillowy bagels And schmear, grabs pierogies at an old school Ukrainian spot, gets the scoop on innovative ice cream flavors, and slurps up some real ramen.

programme.title: Brooklyn’s Best Pizza Tour
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes on the best pizza party crawl that Brooklyn has to offer. He’ll try a Neo-Neapolitan pie, a classic coal oven favorite, he’ll hit up a modern joint with innovative toppings, and a cozy Italian-owned neighborhood spot.

programme.title: BBQ Bowls And Puffy Tacos in San Antonio
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza gets his spurs on to sample San Antonio’s best all-day brunch, taste some epic puffy tacos at a classic car joint, create colorful conchitas, and bask in the beauty of BBQ Thai curry bowls.

programme.title: Dumplings, Steam Buns, and Dim Sum, Oh My!
programme.desc: In a city with over 60 Michelin star restaurants, one brother will live and dine like a king, while the other will check out the city’s more affordable street food scene.

programme.title: Simplicity vs. Splendor on the Seaside
programme.desc: Soaking in the beauty and elegance of the French Riviera, Marko and Alex are in Nice to enjoy the simplicity and splendor of this seaside city.

programme.title: Keep Austin Weird
programme.desc: In the state capital of Texas, Marko and Alex see what Austin has to offer. An eclectic city known for its music and cuisine, the guys brave the Texas heat and check out what keeps Austin weird.

programme.title: Levels of Luxury in Laos
programme.desc: Sandwiched between Thailand, Vietnam, and Cambodia, Laos is a destination often overlooked by tourists. Marko and Alex are uncovering the hidden gem of Vientiane, the capital city, to see what goes on in this sleepy town beside the Mekong River.

programme.title: The Gainful Grace of Geneva
programme.desc: Marko and Alex find themselves in the prosperous and pristine city of Geneva, Switzerland. A city nestled alongside a beautiful glacier-fed lake, the guys will explore the riches Geneva has to offer.

programme.title: The Thriving Traditions of Taipei
programme.desc: ​Welcome to the buzzing capital of Taiwan. A rich blend of cultures, old meets new in this thriving metropolis of Taipei. Marko and Alex eat their way through the city, experiencing some unique traditions along the way.

programme.title: The Lions Share of Lyon
programme.desc: Marko and Alex head to Lyon, France, a city known for its gastronomy and endless history.

programme.title: Oceanside in Okinawa
programme.desc: Ocean breeze, turquoise waters and a whole lot of amazing cuisine. Marko and Alex are soaking up that island life in Okinawa, Japan and learning what makes it so unique.

programme.title: Genoa From Above and Below
programme.desc: In Genoa, the brothers cruise the streets, while one of them gets a taste for the lavish lifestyle of Italys Northwestern port. They take in all the views: heads in the clouds on a high-flying funicular, and just above water at the local aquarium.

programme.title: The L.A. Lifestyle
programme.desc: Green juice, avocado toast, and surfers galore. Marko and Alex are back home in Los Angeles to explore their town, staycation style. From downtown to the beach, the guys do everything fun under the sun in the city of angels.

programme.title: Origins to Originals
programme.desc: From roast chicken to smash burgers to hot sauce, Stephanie Izard meets three different chefs putting their own California-inspired spin on food from their heritage by remixing traditional recipes that center local, fresh ingredients.

programme.title: Home Cooking
programme.desc: From a homerun Greek dinner party series to a backyard that’s become a gourmet deli to a Burmese pop up running out of an apartment kitchen, Stephanie Izard meets cooks finding ingenious ways to serve mouth-watering food out of their houses.

programme.title: Family Style
programme.desc: From brothers selling mom’s Syrian food to a Filipino family remixing a classic dessert to a mom and son running an Indian restaurant out of their house, Stephanie meets multi-gen families turning family recipes into smash hit food business.

programme.title: Unique Eats
programme.desc: From a chef making Italian pasta with Mexican flavors to a groundbreaking functional cocktail bar to a couple that roasts whole goats behind a tire shop, Stephanie Izard finds unique eateries serving up one-of-a-kind food.

programme.title: Comfort Foods
programme.desc: Latin-inspired ice cream to Caribbean, Channa curry doubles to gourmet, deli sandwiches; Stephanie Izard shows what comfort food means to 3 very different cooks and learns how they turned their childhood memories into thriving food businesses.

programme.title: Secret Pizza
programme.desc: With the help of a guide, Stephanie Izard explores the underground secret pizzas of Los Angeles, including an off-menu pizza at a cinnamon bun pop-up, apartment-cooked limited drop specials and gourmet sourdough pies made in pizza van’s mobile oven.

programme.title: Pre-Gaming!
programme.desc: As a former NFL player, game days hit a little different. These days chef Derrell Smith isn’t on the field, hes changing the game in the kitchen with eats like Philly Cheesesteak Taquitos, Oyster Mushroom Wings and Elote Queso with Chili Lime Chips.

programme.title: Dinner Party
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith is hosting a dinner party! Living in KoreaTown, Derrell has fallen in love with its food and culture. Tonight, hes servin up Braised Beef Short Rib with Crispy Rice Cakes, Pickled Cabbage, Glass Noodles Salad and Korean Pancakes.

programme.title: Thankful For Everything
programme.desc: Thanksgiving is here and Chef Derrell Smith is serving up herb cornish hens, cornbread stuffing and cranberry sauce for his main meal. His solo meal is tostones with broccolini and his mystery meal will be filled with traditional holiday favorites.

programme.title: Take-out at Home
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith is tackling his favorite take-out foods at home, serving up Chinese American menu staples with General Tso’s chicken, bok choy and delicious egg rolls. His mystery meal will hopefully be restaurant worthy and packed with flavors.

programme.title: Levels of Luxury in Laos
programme.desc: Sandwiched between Thailand, Vietnam, and Cambodia, Laos is a destination often overlooked by tourists. Marko and Alex are uncovering the hidden gem of Vientiane, the capital city, to see what goes on in this sleepy town beside the Mekong River.

programme.title: Pizza Party on the Grill
programme.desc: It’s Pizza Time! Chef Dale Talde grills up amazing pizzas for every palate including a Detroit Style Pie, a Cheddar Naan Pie with a Spiced Chick Peas And Potatoes, and gives your childhood favorite French Bread Pizza a much needed upgrade.

programme.title: Apocalypse Burgers
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks the summer off right with a burger blowout featuring Brisket Burgers with Grilled Onions and Blue Cheese, Shrimp Burgers with XO Sauce and a Fried Egg, and Lamb Sliders with Feta Ranch and don’t forget the Lemon Oregano Fries.

programme.title: Summer Surf n Turf
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks lobster And steak to the curb as he puts a Spanish-style spin on your typical surf ‘n’ turf by creating Pork And Clams, Lobster and Mushroom Fideos, and Tomato And Tuna Bread then washing it all down with a tasty Michelada.

programme.title: Grill These Sandwiches
programme.desc: Mad Good Food Host Derrell Smith joins Chef Dale Talde at the grill as they cook up some stupendous sandwiches including a Salmon Pastrami Reuben, a Meatball Banh Mi, and even some Grilled Ice Cream Sandwiches.

programme.title: Beer Brats And BBQ Ribs
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde grills up summer favorites perfect for any backyard BBQ. Cheddar beer brats in a pretzel bun, BBQ lamb ribs with Chinese mustard sauce, watermelon lime soju punch, And warm donuts with grilled strawberries And whipped cream for dessert.

programme.title: Bougie Badass Burgers
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings your basic burgers to a new level with his dry-aged beef burger with potatoes and truffle dijon mayo, a part-beef part-pork belly burger with cheddar And an egg, and lastly a crispy mushroom tortilla burger with salsa And cheese.

programme.title: Luxe Lobster And Prime Rib
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde pulls out all the stops for this daddy-sized dinner. He grills up prime rib with herb And horseradish crust, lobster And chili sauce American, charred green beans with garlic tahini, and cheddar-stuffed parker house rolls.

programme.title: Summer Seafood Smorgasbord
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde gets his beach vibes going with a grilled shrimp And lobster cocktail, clams with lemon breadcrumbs, a killer grilled king crab with burnt citrus butter, and a chilled mango frozen daiquiri. Don’t you dare miss this beach party!

programme.title: Feast of Killer Crab And Perfect Pork Belly
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde prepares a finger food feast with char grilled chili crab, spiced adobo potatoes, grilled pork belly, And sofrito stuffed branzino all served on a bed of rice over banana leaves. Call your friends - this is a feast that will feed many!

programme.title: Deluxe Dogs with Crusted Corn And Potatoes
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde puts a modern spin on a classic All-American cookout with his loaded hot dogs, spiced smashed potato salad, chorizo And corn nut crusted corn, and bangin’ banana pudding pops. Sparklers out for this spread!

programme.title: Top of the Line Steaks
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde is back to level up his steak game by grilling up a NY strip steak with roasted onions And poblanos, short ribs with chili paste and horseradish, and a grilled chateaubriand with charred broccolini. Steak your claim on these dishes!

programme.title: Corn Cavatelli Cacio e Pepe And Summer Cobbler
programme.desc: Chef Joe Sasto uses the entire ear of corn to create custom creamy cacio e pepe cavatelli. We’re talking cob, kernel, and husk - and for dessert, he’s making a sweet summery strawberry cobbler that you won’t soon forget.

programme.title: Seaside Scallops with a Salad and a Sweet
programme.desc: Chef Stuart O’Keeffe sears up some scallops with smashed crispy fingerlings and roasted tomatoes. He also dishes up an herbed salad, a light and refreshing vodka cocktail, and a fresh and creamy strawberry parfait.

programme.title: Hot Fried Chicken Sando on A Furikake Bun
programme.desc: Chef Logan Sandoval serves up a hot fried chicken sandwich on a homemade furikake bun with Japanese mayo and southern-style slaw. On the side, he preps deliciously crispy hand-cut fries - dig in to this fried feast!

programme.title: Poolside Shrimp Taco Platter
programme.desc: Chef Angie Lee transports you to Baja, Mexico with her crispy tempura fried Baja shrimp tacos with salsa, black beans, and cilantro cauliflower rice. Corn salad with chipotle dressing adds a good crunch too!

programme.title: Egg Yolk Raviolo with Whipped Ricotta
programme.desc: Chef Joe Sasto shows us the art of pasta making by creating a gorgeous raviolo. This pasta is filled with egg yolk and fluffy ricotta in a brown butter sauce. A tomato salad and orange blossom cookies finish it all off.

programme.title: Pork Katsu And Spicy Curry
programme.desc: Chef Logan Sandoval makes his version of a Japanese katsu and curry with a breaded and fried pork cutlet and a spicy vegetable curry laced with lemongrass and garlic. On the side, a Hawaiian potato salad made with bacon!

programme.title: Coastal Seafood And Chocolatey Churros
programme.desc: LA Native Chef Angie Lee’s Baja shrimp and rockfish ceviche gets a citrusy twist. Mexican sea bass is served with a colorful corn slaw and spicy grilled pineapple, and fried churros with gooey chocolate are for dessert.

programme.title: Roast Chicken And Bread Salad
programme.desc: Irish Chef Stuart O’Keeffe shows us how to make his perfect lemon And garlic roast chicken. A simple panzanella and burrata salad is up next, followed by his chewy no-bake crispy date cookies, which are to die for.

programme.title: Not Your Moms Meatballs And Gnocchi
programme.desc: Chef Joe Sasto is paying homage to his mom’s meatballs, but adding in some mortadella and fennel salame! He’s pairing them with homemade ricotta gnocchetti and roasted carrots. For dessert, a no-churn banana ice cream.

programme.title: Kimchi And Other Korean Classics
programme.desc: This menu is Chef Angie Lee’s love letter to her Korean roots. She’s making a veggie mixed rice bowl called bibimbap complete with cucumber kimchi and a classic seaweed soup. A yuja cha soda drink tops it all off.

programme.title: Irish Crispy Fish And Chips
programme.desc: Irish Chef Stuart O’Keeffe puts a modern twist on fish n’ chips by adding champagne batter, a malt vinegar aioli, and the thrice cooked chips. On the side, smashed minty peas, and a delicious dump cake for dessert.

programme.title: Pork Katsu And Spicy Curry
programme.desc: Chef Logan Sandoval makes his version of a Japanese katsu and curry with a breaded and fried pork cutlet and a spicy vegetable curry laced with lemongrass and garlic. On the side, a Hawaiian potato salad made with bacon!

programme.desc: LA Native Chef Angie Lee’s Baja shrimp and rockfish ceviche gets a citrusy twist. Mexican sea bass is served with a colorful corn slaw and spicy grilled pineapple, and fried churros with gooey chocolate are for dessert.

programme.title: Pizza Party on the Grill
programme.desc: It’s Pizza Time! Chef Dale Talde grills up amazing pizzas for every palate including a Detroit Style Pie, a Cheddar Naan Pie with a Spiced Chick Peas And Potatoes, and gives your childhood favorite French Bread Pizza a much needed upgrade.

programme.title: Apocalypse Burgers
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks the summer off right with a burger blowout featuring Brisket Burgers with Grilled Onions and Blue Cheese, Shrimp Burgers with XO Sauce and a Fried Egg, and Lamb Sliders with Feta Ranch and don’t forget the Lemon Oregano Fries.

programme.title: Summer Surf n Turf
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks lobster And steak to the curb as he puts a Spanish-style spin on your typical surf ‘n’ turf by creating Pork And Clams, Lobster and Mushroom Fideos, and Tomato And Tuna Bread then washing it all down with a tasty Michelada.

programme.title: Grill These Sandwiches
programme.desc: Mad Good Food Host Derrell Smith joins Chef Dale Talde at the grill as they cook up some stupendous sandwiches including a Salmon Pastrami Reuben, a Meatball Banh Mi, and even some Grilled Ice Cream Sandwiches.

programme.title: Beer Brats And BBQ Ribs
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde grills up summer favorites perfect for any backyard BBQ. Cheddar beer brats in a pretzel bun, BBQ lamb ribs with Chinese mustard sauce, watermelon lime soju punch, And warm donuts with grilled strawberries And whipped cream for dessert.

programme.title: Bougie Badass Burgers
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings your basic burgers to a new level with his dry-aged beef burger with potatoes and truffle dijon mayo, a part-beef part-pork belly burger with cheddar And an egg, and lastly a crispy mushroom tortilla burger with salsa And cheese.

programme.title: Luxe Lobster And Prime Rib
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde pulls out all the stops for this daddy-sized dinner. He grills up prime rib with herb And horseradish crust, lobster And chili sauce American, charred green beans with garlic tahini, and cheddar-stuffed parker house rolls.

programme.title: Summer Seafood Smorgasbord
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde gets his beach vibes going with a grilled shrimp And lobster cocktail, clams with lemon breadcrumbs, a killer grilled king crab with burnt citrus butter, and a chilled mango frozen daiquiri. Don’t you dare miss this beach party!

programme.title: Top of the Line Steaks
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde is back to level up his steak game by grilling up a NY strip steak with roasted onions And poblanos, short ribs with chili paste and horseradish, and a grilled chateaubriand with charred broccolini. Steak your claim on these dishes!

programme.title: Corn Cavatelli Cacio e Pepe And Summer Cobbler
programme.desc: Chef Joe Sasto uses the entire ear of corn to create custom creamy cacio e pepe cavatelli. We’re talking cob, kernel, and husk - and for dessert, he’s making a sweet summery strawberry cobbler that you won’t soon forget.

programme.title: Seaside Scallops with a Salad and a Sweet
programme.desc: Chef Stuart O’Keeffe sears up some scallops with smashed crispy fingerlings and roasted tomatoes. He also dishes up an herbed salad, a light and refreshing vodka cocktail, and a fresh and creamy strawberry parfait.

programme.title: Hot Fried Chicken Sando on A Furikake Bun
programme.desc: Chef Logan Sandoval serves up a hot fried chicken sandwich on a homemade furikake bun with Japanese mayo and southern-style slaw. On the side, he preps deliciously crispy hand-cut fries - dig in to this fried feast!

programme.title: Meet the Parents
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith is making Steakhouse classics for his main meal; for his solo meal he’s putting his own twist on a traditional eggs benedict. His mystery meal will of course be a surprise but will hopefully win over even the pickiest parentals.

programme.title: Tis the Season
programme.desc: It’s holiday time and Chef Derrell is feeling festive and making a feast fit for a king with crown roast and sweet potato gratin. A Monte Cristo sandwich screams Christmas for a solo dish and is delivered with sweet and snowy powdered sugar on top.

programme.title: Traditional Fish Fry
programme.desc: A traditional and delicious fish fry is served with cornmeal crusted fried whiting fish, hushpuppies and coleslaw. Chef Derrell Smith also pairs fish beignets with his signature spicy sauce in addition to cultural takeaways from this celebration.

programme.title: Burgers and Shakes
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith shares his diner favorites and childhood memories with smash burgers, shakes and homemade tater tots. His twist on New York City’s bodega chopped cheese sandwiches are loaded on waffle tots that will please any late night cravings.

programme.title: Springtime
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith is ready for springtime and makes a family meal bloom with braised lamb shanks, lemon couscous and a seasonal watermelon and feta salad. His single meals blossom with a simple and savory lamb curry and deliciously fresh lamb gyros.

programme.title: Sunday Supper
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith is serving up Sunday Supper with his signature meatballs with creamy polenta, parmesan crisps and a spicy gremolata for the family meal. Solo meals are full of flavor with a meatball soup and a delicious meatball mozzarella sub.

programme.title: Guys Night Out
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith shares his Guys’ Night Out favorite moment and meal of lemon pepper chicken wings and loaded fries from his days in Houston playing football. Solo meals also sizzle with Nashville Hot Chicken and Waffles and Curry Chicken Salad.

programme.title: Ultimate Taco Tuesday
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith is doing Taco Tuesday his own delicious way with pernil tacos, mexican street corn and homemade guacamole. The fiesta continues with solo meals of pork empanadas and dessert for dinner with flambe maduros with vanilla ice cream.

programme.title: Mothers Day
programme.desc: Mother’s Day has a special place in Chef Derrell’s life; he shares his favorite family meal of shrimp with grits, cheddar biscuits and stories from past celebrations. Solo meals include grit cakes, shrimp ceviche and a breakfast biscuit sandwich.

programme.title: Break Up Meal
programme.desc: Comfort foods are being served up for the lovers, single folks or the recently broken-hearted as Chef Derrell prepares his delicious lobster mac n’ cheese, fire-roasted tomato bisque with lobster grilled cheese sandwiches and zucchini ribbon rolls.

programme.title: Summer Cookout
programme.desc: Chef Derrell kicks off the Summer with a traditional Low-Country Boil, shrimp Po-Boy sandwich with jerk mayonnaise and a light potato corn chowder. Summer also screams freshness so a mixed-berry skillet cobbler is on the menu to tease your tastebuds.

programme.title: Juneteenth
programme.desc: Chef Derrell celebrates Juneteenth and his culture with finger-licking BBQ ribs, collard greens and potato salad; he also creates a new twist on a traditional egg roll with his signature sauce and a pulled BBQ pork sandwich thats loaded with flavor.

programme.title: Thankful For Everything
programme.desc: Thanksgiving is here and Chef Derrell Smith is serving up herb cornish hens, cornbread stuffing and cranberry sauce for his main meal. His solo meal is tostones with broccolini and his mystery meal will be filled with traditional holiday favorites.

programme.title: Take-out at Home
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith is tackling his favorite take-out foods at home, serving up Chinese American menu staples with General Tso’s chicken, bok choy and delicious egg rolls. His mystery meal will hopefully be restaurant worthy and packed with flavors.

programme.title: Meat Lovers!
programme.desc: On this episode, we serve up our favorite meat-themed recipes! From chicken, to pork and steak, meat lovers everywhere are in for a treat!

programme.title: Solo YOLO
programme.desc: Program perjalanan realiti mengenai eksplorasi solo ke beberapa negara, untuk mengalami keunikan pemandangan dan aktiviti tempat di tempat yang dilawati.

programme.title: Garden of Treasure
programme.desc: Buckle up as Darren takes us back on the road in this new season! Join him as he discovers herb gardens filled with treasures across Malaysias farms And markets - and scales the mountains of East Malaysia, searching for the medicinal herbs used by the aboriginal people And local Chinese.

programme.title: Travel Lawak
programme.desc: Sebuah program travelog yang menampilkan tiga pelawak popular iaitu Syuk, Sharif Zero dan Mamak Puteh di mana mereka akan mengembara ke luar negara dan meneroka sendiri budaya dan tempat-tempat menarik.

programme.title: Extreme Roadtrip
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan travelog yang akan mengikuti pengembaraan 3 sekawan menerokai tempat-tempat menarik di semenanjung Malaysia demi merealisasikan bucketlist masing-masing.

programme.title: Semmaiyaana Saapadu
programme.desc: A mom and her daughters modernize traditional cooking with healthier versions of beloved recipes, serving up nostalgia with a nutritious twist.

programme.title: RASA Anak Emak Anak Bapak
programme.desc: Program masakan ini memerlukan selebriti jemputan membawa ibu atau bapa mereka menjelajah Malaysia bagi merasa sendiri masakan kegemaran ibu bapa masing-masing.

programme.title: Escape From Mogadishu
programme.desc: Personnel of the North and South Korea embassies must join hands to escape from war-torn Somalia.

programme.title: Veteran
programme.desc: A merciless detective hunts down a young and successful drug addict who always escapes from investigations with the help of his wealth and connections.

programme.title: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: A disgraced Korean researcher claims to have successfully cloned human embryo stem cells. However, the results were revealed to be fabricated along with other unethical practices later.

programme.title: The Magician
programme.desc: A talented young magician falls for a princess betrothed to his former teacher, leading to a fierce showdown between the two powerful magicians.

programme.title: The Night Owl
programme.desc: A blind acupuncturist, who strangely, is able to see normally at night, happens to witness the death of the crown prince.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: Cart
programme.desc: As a social critique, Cart tells a story of the employees of a retail supermarket band together when the contract workers are summarily laid off.

programme.title: Train to Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: Nocturnal
programme.desc: After his brother Seok-tae returns as a bloody corpse, Min-tae discovers the death of his brother was foretold in a novel, and Seok-taes wife had a suspicious call with the novelist...

programme.title: The Priests
programme.desc: After a girl is assaulted, two priests must determine if she was attacked by an evil spirit or a molester.

programme.title: A Taxi Driver
programme.desc: A widowed father and taxi driver takes a German reporter from Seoul to Gwangju to cover the 1980 uprising.

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.

programme.title: 200 Pounds Beauty
programme.desc: A timid, overweight and under-appreciated back-up singer resorts to drastic head-to-toe plastic surgery to become a pop diva.

programme.title: Sisters on the Road
programme.desc: After her mothers death, Myung-eun meets her sister Myung-ju. They do not share the same father and decided to travel together to find Myung-euns father. A secret of her father reveals...

programme.title: Exhuma
programme.desc: Exhuma follows two shamans, a feng shui expert and an undertaker as they seek to help a Korean-American family tormented by an ancestral curse.

programme.title: Veteran
programme.desc: A merciless detective hunts down a young and successful drug addict who always escapes from investigations with the help of his wealth and connections.

programme.title: Train to Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: Dr. Cheon and the Lost Talisman
programme.desc: Dr. Cheon is a fake exorcist who cannot see or hear any ghosts. One day, a woman comes to Dr. Cheon, asking him to save her possessed younger sister...

programme.title: Hard Hit
programme.desc: On his way to work with his kids, a man received a mysterious call claiming hes sitting on a bomb that will go off if he gets out of his seat.

programme.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
programme.desc: After barely surviving a violent attack by an elusive serial killer, a crime boss finds himself forming an unlikely partnership with a local detective to catch the sadistic killer.

programme.title: A Millionaires First Love
programme.desc: To inherit his grandfathers fortune, Jae-kyung has to transfer to a school in the countryside. He fell in love with a pretty girl Eun-hwan and is going to know about her secrets...

programme.title: The Witch: Part 2. the Other One
programme.desc: After a girl emerges as the sole survivor of a bloody raid on the research facility behind the top-secret Witch Program, she is rescued by a pair of civilians who soon realise that more danger lies ahead.

programme.title: The Night Owl
programme.desc: A blind acupuncturist, who strangely, is able to see normally at night, happens to witness the death of the crown prince.

programme.title: The Tiger
programme.desc: While the Kingdom of Korea is under occupation by the Japanese, an old and experienced hunter is challenged by the hunt of the last tiger in the country.

programme.title: Deep Trap
programme.desc: A couple travel to a remote island for a restaurant famous online, yet unexpected danger awaits when they met the restaurant owner.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E093
programme.desc: Hilario acusa sorpresa cuando Victoria le revela que, ya que el está empeñado en caerse, será ella misma quien lo termine de tumbar quitándole Cantarrana; el señor Guanipa se conmueve cuando su hija, con lágrimas, le reprocha que se comporte como si se quisiera morir e intenta tranquilizarla asegurándole que no va a perder la hacienda como todos creen; sin embargo, sus argumentos no son válidos para Victoria, quien le advierte que le llego el momento de que acepte que ahora ella es más fuerte que el. La sorpresa se apodera de Adelaida cuando uno de los acreedores de Hilario la visita para proponerle que el se puede encargar de matar a Guanipa siempre y cuando ella se comprometa a que, una vez que quede viuda, pagará todas las deudas del hombre; la señora ordena a Moncho saque al hombre de su casa pues, aunque odia a Hilario, no va a prestarse para que lo maten. Ya en la recepcion del matrimonio, Fernanda se tensa cuando Caravaggio, algo pasado de tragos, comenta ante Leopoldo que esa boda, al igual que la de Nicolás con Florencia, es un error; el señor Alcoy quiere una explicacion de sus palabras, pero el periodista sugiere le pregunte directamente a Nicolás a que se refería cuando le dijo a Victoria que Clementina tuvo más valentía que ellos dos.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E103
programme.desc: Camila ofrece a Patricia entregar el video, solo si traiciona a Fausto y lo entrega a la policía. Patricia dice a Camila que su mamá no era tan santa y que fue la causante de esta guerra entre las familias, por su relacion con dos hombres a la vez. Fausto, contrata nuevamente a Anton para que mate a su esposa.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E104
programme.desc: Fausto y Ezequiel enfrentados; el video que proyecta la muerte de Celso hundirá a Fausto a menos que firme una confesion donde aclare que Rosa Blanco fue condenada injustamente. Fausto manipula diciendo que tambien Ezequiel confiese que mato a su hermano Augusto, el papá de Camila. Ella llega a tiempo para impedir que Ezequiel le dispare a Fausto.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E02
programme.desc: Clara desea que los Santa María la acepten para cumplir con su sueño de tener una verdadera familia

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E03
programme.desc: Clara necesita saber si es una Santa Maria; situacion que afecta a Raúl, pues le ha mentido a su amada con la ayuda de sus amigos.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E03
programme.desc: Claudio gives instructions to Pedro about the new plan to kill his brother. In an attempt to recover the million dollars that a third party collected with the stolen check, Ricardo and Paulina go before the bank manager who confirms that the operation was clean and cannot be reversed. Lorena receives a package from her husband.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E100
programme.desc: Cesar Román tiene su programa de cocina, pero en pánico durante la primera transmision, Mamá Juana sorprende a todos al tomar la conduccion del programa.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E01
programme.desc: En cuanto Palacios decide confesar lo que hizo con su sopa, Cesar Román la declara como la ganadora indiscutible del concurso.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E093
programme.desc: Hilario acusa sorpresa cuando Victoria le revela que, ya que el está empeñado en caerse, será ella misma quien lo termine de tumbar quitándole Cantarrana; el señor Guanipa se conmueve cuando su hija, con lágrimas, le reprocha que se comporte como si se quisiera morir e intenta tranquilizarla asegurándole que no va a perder la hacienda como todos creen; sin embargo, sus argumentos no son válidos para Victoria, quien le advierte que le llego el momento de que acepte que ahora ella es más fuerte que el. La sorpresa se apodera de Adelaida cuando uno de los acreedores de Hilario la visita para proponerle que el se puede encargar de matar a Guanipa siempre y cuando ella se comprometa a que, una vez que quede viuda, pagará todas las deudas del hombre; la señora ordena a Moncho saque al hombre de su casa pues, aunque odia a Hilario, no va a prestarse para que lo maten. Ya en la recepcion del matrimonio, Fernanda se tensa cuando Caravaggio, algo pasado de tragos, comenta ante Leopoldo que esa boda, al igual que la de Nicolás con Florencia, es un error; el señor Alcoy quiere una explicacion de sus palabras, pero el periodista sugiere le pregunte directamente a Nicolás a que se refería cuando le dijo a Victoria que Clementina tuvo más valentía que ellos dos.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E094
programme.desc: Sergio, que entiende la urgencia de Victoria por ir a Cantarrana para estar con sus padres, acepta acompañarla con la excusa de que lo hace por proteger su inversion. Hilario no quiere que Victoria se presente en la hacienda porque teme que sus acreedores aprovechen su presencia para presionarlo aún más; Adelaida, que cree que al hombre solo le importa su propia suerte, le advierte que si algo llega a pasarle a su hija por su culpa, será ella misma quien se encargue de hacerlo pagar por eso. Fernanda no puede evitar el llanto cuando Leopoldo, al sorprender su conversacion con Nicolás, descubre que fue ella quien obligo a su sobrino a casarse con Florencia. La sorpresa se apodera de Hilario cuando Victoria y Sergio ofrecen comprarle el sesenta por cierto de Cantarrana; el señor se niega a aceptar, pero su hija trata de hacerle ver que no le queda otra opcion más digna que esa si quiere evitar que el trabajo de toda su vida vaya a dar a manos de sus acreedores de juego. Los nervios invaden a Victoria cuando Sergio le deja entrever que está sintiendo por ella una atraccion que va más allá de su relacion laboral; sin embargo, Escalante no se atreve a seguir adelante porque la joven Guanipa lo corta aclarando que lo único que a ellos los une son los negocios.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E104
programme.desc: Fausto y Ezequiel enfrentados; el video que proyecta la muerte de Celso hundirá a Fausto a menos que firme una confesion donde aclare que Rosa Blanco fue condenada injustamente. Fausto manipula diciendo que tambien Ezequiel confiese que mato a su hermano Augusto, el papá de Camila. Ella llega a tiempo para impedir que Ezequiel le dispare a Fausto.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E105
programme.desc: En medio de la subasta de arte, el matrimonio Del Casal tiene un furtivo encuentro con Victoria y Sergio; Florencia cree que a Victoria le enfurece verla con su amado Nicolás, pero Victoria le aclara que Nicolás solo está con ella por compromiso y nada más. A Cantarrana se presenta Carlos Hansen para proponerle un trato a Hilario: se mudará a otro país con Adelaida sí Guanipa firma el divorcio; Hilario no está dispuesto a aceptar sin dar la pelea. Fernanda ha tomado la decision de enviar a su hija Eugenia a un internado suizo, pues la mala influencia de Yosmir es lo que ha ocasionado las actitudes rebeldes de la chica. Despues de haber firmado el divorcio, Adelaida es feliz porque ahora podrá rehacer su vida al lado de Hansen, quien le hace saber que deberán mudarse para cumplir con Hilario.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E03
programme.desc: Clara necesita saber si es una Santa Maria; situacion que afecta a Raúl, pues le ha mentido a su amada con la ayuda de sus amigos.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E04
programme.desc: Edilio presenta a Clara y a su madre, Albornoz no cree que la mujer sea Pastora Lara, afirmando que conocio a la verdadera mamá de Raúl.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E04
programme.desc: Gertrudis plots a mass shooting for the party. Alberto is caught up in memories of the past, including a letter where Lorenita declared her love for him. At the Oceanography Institute, Isabel surprises Malena with a bouquet of flowers as a show of admiration for her new appointment. Guillermo warns Lorena of the danger her son faces for having fled the Corona household without killing Marco Aurelio.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E05
programme.desc: Lorena tries to send Alberto away, but he only seeks to break the ice and plays alluding to his childhood loves; provoking even more anger and jealousy in Guillermo, who remains threatening - Ricardo decides to hire the electrician services of María Bonita Echeverri, as a way to approach one of the four suspects with the same last name Echeverri of the theft of the check.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E100

Los nervios invaden a Victoria cuando Sergio le deja entrever que está sintiendo por ella una atraccion que va más allá de su relacion laboral; sin embargo, Escalante no se atreve a seguir adelante porque la joven Guanipa lo corta aclarando que lo único que a ellos los une son los negocios.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E104
programme.desc: Fausto y Ezequiel enfrentados; el video que proyecta la muerte de Celso hundirá a Fausto a menos que firme una confesion donde aclare que Rosa Blanco fue condenada injustamente. Fausto manipula diciendo que tambien Ezequiel confiese que mato a su hermano Augusto, el papá de Camila. Ella llega a tiempo para impedir que Ezequiel le dispare a Fausto.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E105
programme.desc: En medio de la subasta de arte, el matrimonio Del Casal tiene un furtivo encuentro con Victoria y Sergio; Florencia cree que a Victoria le enfurece verla con su amado Nicolás, pero Victoria le aclara que Nicolás solo está con ella por compromiso y nada más. A Cantarrana se presenta Carlos Hansen para proponerle un trato a Hilario: se mudará a otro país con Adelaida sí Guanipa firma el divorcio; Hilario no está dispuesto a aceptar sin dar la pelea. Fernanda ha tomado la decision de enviar a su hija Eugenia a un internado suizo, pues la mala influencia de Yosmir es lo que ha ocasionado las actitudes rebeldes de la chica. Despues de haber firmado el divorcio, Adelaida es feliz porque ahora podrá rehacer su vida al lado de Hansen, quien le hace saber que deberán mudarse para cumplir con Hilario.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E03
programme.desc: Clara necesita saber si es una Santa Maria; situacion que afecta a Raúl, pues le ha mentido a su amada con la ayuda de sus amigos.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E04
programme.desc: Edilio presenta a Clara y a su madre, Albornoz no cree que la mujer sea Pastora Lara, afirmando que conocio a la verdadera mamá de Raúl.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E04
programme.desc: Gertrudis plots a mass shooting for the party. Alberto is caught up in memories of the past, including a letter where Lorenita declared her love for him. At the Oceanography Institute, Isabel surprises Malena with a bouquet of flowers as a show of admiration for her new appointment. Guillermo warns Lorena of the danger her son faces for having fled the Corona household without killing Marco Aurelio.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E01
programme.desc: En cuanto Palacios decide confesar lo que hizo con su sopa, Cesar Román la declara como la ganadora indiscutible del concurso.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E02
programme.desc: Carlos revela ante Adriana la comprometida vision que tiene de ser padre; la chef vuelve a molestarse con el medico en el instante que una mujer se acerca a el seductora.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E095
programme.desc: Nicolás Del Casal quiere dejar los continuos enfrentamientos con Victoria Guanipa, quien asegura que eso solo podría pasar si el acepta venderle la hacienda Los Samanes porque, de lo contrario, ella seguirá tratando de quitarle todos los negocios posibles hasta que a el no le quede más remedio que rematar la hacienda. Con la excusa de que quiere ganarse la confianza de su padre Leopoldo Alcoy, Federico busca a Hansen con la intencion de pedirle un prestamo para hacer un negocio; el joven, que se molesta cuando el empresario se niega a apoyarlo por considerar que el trato que le ofrecieron es una estafa, sentencia que va a convertirse en un hombre millonario por cuenta propia. Cansada de que Victoria insista en atacar a su sobrino Nicolás, Fernanda de Alcoy advierte a Florencia que ellas deberán encargarse de que la joven Guanipa pierda su hacienda Cantarrana; la joven señora Del Casal considera que ella sola puede encargase de enfrentar a su rival sin que su tía política se involucre.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E096
programme.desc: Nicolás Del Casal quiere dejar los continuos enfrentamientos con Victoria Guanipa, quien asegura que eso solo podría pasar si el acepta venderle la hacienda Los Samanes porque, de lo contrario, ella seguirá tratando de quitarle todos los negocios posibles hasta que a el no le quede más remedio que rematar la hacienda. programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E105
programme.desc: Fausto, narra detalladamente lo que sucedio hace años. Miente descaradamente, Torrealba piensa que quiere culpar a su esposa por haberle sido infiel. Camila reprocha duramente a la Madre Isabel. Rosa no puede aparecer púes quieren matarla. Axel, decepcionado porque Amelia le oculto la paternidad de su hijo.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E106
programme.desc: Ezequiel en pugna con sus hijos. Camila los defiende y le dice que sus hijos le temen. Max está dispuesto a verse con Rosa, aún en peligro de su vida y Camila organiza una fiesta para desenmascarar a Elda.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E04
programme.desc: Edilio presenta a Clara y a su madre, Albornoz no cree que la mujer sea Pastora Lara, afirmando que conocio a la verdadera mamá de Raúl.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E05
programme.desc: Nicolás lleva a Clara Ines a la mansion de Santa María.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E05
programme.desc: Lorena tries to send Alberto away, but he only seeks to break the ice and plays alluding to his childhood loves; provoking even more anger and jealousy in Guillermo, who remains threatening - Ricardo decides to hire the electrician services of María Bonita Echeverri, as a way to approach one of the four suspects with the same last name Echeverri of the theft of the check.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E06
programme.desc: At the party, fire is opened on the guests but Lorena puts a bulletproof vest on Marco Aurelio, saving his life. Guillermo, enraged, orders Lorena to kill him once and for all. Ricardo goes to report to his mother the result of his dealings with the second María Echeverri and finds Paulina with the bank statement showing the withdrawal of the million dollars.

programme.title: Dropped - S08:E02 - Maniac Mountain
programme.desc: More than ten years on, Maniac Mountain gives the brothers another groundbreaking achievement.

programme.title: Wardens - S03:E08 - Operation Rocky Mountain Front
programme.desc: During hunting season, game wardens stay on their toes by catching poachers with an elk decoy, tracking down trespassers, and checking hunting tags.

programme.title: Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots - S02:E04 - Heaven at 5000 Feet
programme.desc: Pilot Josiah Freeman takes a professional snowboarder Mark Barajas to the top of the Chugach Mountains for some hellacious heli-skiing.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons - S02:E03 - Just-Terry-Fied
programme.desc: Terry and Larry put the show Justified to the test.

programme.title: Jim Shockeys Uncharted - S01:E05 - Life and Death
programme.desc: Temperate Rain Forest Pt2. Jim comes face to face with a monster black bear in the coastal rain forest of the Pacific Northwest.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E24 - The Queen Her True Story
programme.desc: The story of an extraordinary woman and her incredible life.

programme.title: Dropped - S02:E02 - Horses Can Think...Rafts Cant
programme.desc: In episode two, Casey continues where they left off. Theyre faced with a choice. Once theyve settled into a risky spot on the mountain, they see that the ram they were after isnt legal to hunt, so they have to retreat.

programme.title: Dropped - S02:E03 - Band of Ten
programme.desc: The crew reaches a canyon where they find a group of ten rams. After the thrill of the first wave, they quickly become disappointed and frustrated when none of the rams are legally suitable.

programme.title: Dropped - S02:E04 - Now or Never
programme.desc: As the mist drifts past the craggy top of Fish Hook, the crews shapes slowly come into view right where the ram had been resting. Did they fire without Chris hearing the sound?

programme.title: Alaskas Wild Gourmet - S01:E03 - Hunters Paradise
programme.desc: Catering off the grid isnt easy and the Ewing Family knows it. A group of 8 hunters will be served a beet salad followed by braised venison and for desert cheesecake with lingonberries.

programme.title: Alaskas Wild Gourmet - S01:E04 - Celebration
programme.desc: Another 5 Star meal from the Ewing Family. This time it is a dinner for some local natives. Bradley decides to go on a hunt for a goat for the first course of slow braised goat ragout, followed by a fish risotto, and for the main course - curried goat with apple and rose hip chutney and to complete the dinner a chocolate molten lava cake for desert.

programme.title: Alaskas Wild Gourmet - S01:E05 - Fishermans Catch
programme.desc: Bradley is looking to give a group of fishermen an unusual dinner - something totally unexpected. On the menu: sea snails followed by an ambitious sea cucumber dish and for the main course a Dungeness Crab Risotto.

programme.title: Alaskas Wild Gourmet - S01:E06 - Alutiq Anniversary
programme.desc: Its Game On for the Ewing Family as they plan a dinner to celebrate the 20th Anniversary of the AlutIq Museum. On the menu: clam fritters with kelp, kelp with rhubarb and cranberry jam, game meat with horse-radish mash potatoes with mushrooms, asparagus and leeks. The challenge is on to produce a memorable dinner from local ingredients for the Alutiq people and presenting it in a way that they have never had it before.

programme.title: Alaskas Wild Gourmet - S01:E07 - Bush Pilots Birthday
programme.desc: A Bush Pilots Birthday warrants a treat of a menu with pacific spot prawns and pasta to kick off this episodes menu followed by duck breast with celery root and for the main course there is rabbit and carrots.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S01:E05 - Ron Smith Story
programme.desc: The true story of Ron Smiths encounter with a fearless deer that attacked both him and his nephew, Arik, while out fishing.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S01:E06 - Jackson Jordan
programme.desc: This episode features Jackson Jordon and his narrow escape from death in the woods of Georgia after an attack from a pack of coyotes when he was only 16.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S01:E07 - Mischelle Hileman
programme.desc: This week, Mischelle Hileman finds herself deep in the Oregon wilderness on an elk hunt when she gets lost, injured and on the brink of death.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S01:E08 - The Rick Collins Story
programme.desc: A father and son set out on a cliff side sheep hunt, but one slip could mean life or death in this remote and unforgiving area.
